page.description: Returns a list of the valid drives.

argument.name: Separator
argument.description: The character you wish to use to separate drives in the returned list.

page.discussion: The FILE.DRIVES_GET() method returns a string, File_List, that contains a list of all of the logical drives, separated by Separator. For example, "A:\,C:\,D:\,E:\,F:\"

section.title: Example
section.description: The FILE.DRIVES_GET() method returns a list of drives.
